By Yvette TanBBC News 
image captionCan Disney's Raya embody a 'South East Asian' identity?
It's taken almost 90 years - but Disney's first South East Asian heroine premiered on Thursday. 
Raya is… [+5160 chars]
articles.description: After almost 90 years of animated films, Disney has finally ventured into South East Asia.
articles.title: Raya and the Last Dragon: Disney's new heroine representing 670 million people - BBC News

articles.content: KUALA LUMPUR: AirAsia Group Bhd plans to launch an air taxi service and the country's first drone delivery service as the budget carrier seeks to diversify amid the coronavirus pandemic, the company'… [+1339 chars]
articles.description: KUALA LUMPUR: AirAsia Group Bhd plans to launch an air taxi service and the country's first drone delivery service as the budget carrier seeks to diversify amid the coronavirus pandemic, the company's CEO said on Saturday.
articles.title: AirAsia Group plans air taxi, drone delivery service - The Star Online
